akn:section.akn:heading: Application for establishment and expansion of zone

akn:content.akn:p: (a) Application for establishment; requirements Each application shall state in detail—

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Amendment of application; expansion of zone

akn:content.akn:p: (b) Amendment of application; expansion of zone The Board may upon its own initiative or upon request permit the amendment of the application. Any expansion of the area of an established zone shall be made and approved in the same manner as an original application.
